item.title: #9 - Breakfast
item.description: The Question: When was the last time you treated yourself? The Topic: What’s the deal with Breakfast? The Viewermail: It looks like a fan has developed Reade fever. thewritersdailypodcast@gmail.com

item.title: #9 - Breakfast
item.description: the_question When was the last time you treated yourself? If it was moments ago to a dirty wank on the homepage of PornHub then shame on you. In my case, I very rarely treat myself. Usually my partner does it for me. She buys all sorts of nice the_topic What’s the deal with Breakfast? I don’t eat breakfast I do the whole fasting thing (talk about benefits) The body simply adjusts Probably largely has to do with having more time (a sad facet of modern society) the_viewermail Jim Jekins
